column4: hi guys.  i have hda1(storage), hda2(ubuntu), hda4+hda5(extended, and swap).. I want to re-size hda1.. but when I try to re-size hda2, it puts the space AFTER hda2.. is there anyway I can re-size hda2..  and put the space before hda2?
so just go ahead and re-sze hda2, and then 'move' it?
I thnk that is what I wrote
